framework.utils.io

Class Paths

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.utils.io.Paths

  • public final class Paths
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for path related operations dealing with files of various sorts
    Author:
    Daniel Ricci <thedanny09@icloud.com>

        Helper method used to treat string as extensions based on the specified flags
        Parameters:
        extension - The extension string
        supressExtension - if the extension should be included or not
        Returns:
        The extension string filtered by the specified flag

        Returns:

        Converts the class package name to the logical path on disk
        Parameters:
        classType - The class type of the class to be converted
        Returns:
        The logical absolute path associated to the class type specified
